content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To stay focused it is important to take regular breaks. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"During your breaks, you can do short outdoor or indoor activities or some stretching exercises (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://zivjetizdravo.eu/2020/03/21/tjelesno-zdravlje-odrasli/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Daily 10-minute physical exercise for adults\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Physical activity is important for maintaining our physical and mental health and helps us to concentrate more easily on work tasks. Therefore, give yourself the opportunity not to be on digital devices during breaks and spend some of your free time outside if possible. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
